alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:41AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leake, northern Newton, northeastern Scott and Neshoba Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madden, or 7 miles northwest of Prospect, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dowdville around 345 AM CDT. Prospect around 350 AM CDT. Dixon around 355 AM CDT. Neshoba around 400 AM CDT. Bethsaida and House around 410 AM CDT. Herbert Springs and Forestdale around 415 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Tucker and Sebastopol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central and east central Mississippi.
